promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic simple ibex electric-type pokemon wearing a lightning-charged mask. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, electric or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Voltornyx, a a gigantic simple ibex electric-type pokemon. It can be found in thunderstorm-like environments It has the following abilities: Thunderpunch. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "electric" or "Voltornyx". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of electric-type pokemon, ibex-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, yellow and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This lofty mountain dweller harnesses storm energy with its spiral horns. Known for its thunderous punches, it's a sight in tempestuous climate.
